title: (x) Head Automatica album cover - Neue Swellvetica {Dav}
content:
I would really love to know what this font is, if it is, in fact, a font. The “head automat1ca” text, please. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Decadence.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Decadence.jpg) | 63.1 KB |
author: Liv

comments.content: My guess is custom lettering — but some signs point to influence of Helvetica Light (turn that M sideways and you’ll see what I mean ;)) and also House’s Chalet series.
The M looks like Helvetica’s “3” turned sideways.. and the 1 for the “I” matches Helvetica, too.. so I’m guessing it is just a strange, customized mix-n-match of Helvetica and Chalet.

Wow, that’s pretty good. The things I noticed, however, are …

- The “1” in Helvetica needed a bit of tweaking to get it looking right.  
- The “u” and “h” in Chalet don’t look like those in the image.

Thank you, by the way. :)
Do you happen to know where I may find that font?

It has been featured in the very first ‘issue’ of [DesignerShock](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042533/http:/www.designershock.com/), and the book Trigger _( Die Gestalten )_, but, sadly enough, the site is no longer available.. _( And, It doesnt seem to be one of the typefaces featured at [DS4Sale](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042533/http:/www.ds4sale.com/).. )_ Maybe contact Stefan Gandl / [Neubau Berlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042533/http:/www.neubauberlin.com/).?

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042533/http:/www.formlos.net/)
